description: A versatile Filipino omelet combining ground meat with a medley of vegetables, perfect for breakfast or lunch.
ingredients: [{"name": "Vegetable Oil", "units": "tablespoons", "amount": 2}, {"name": "garlic", "units": "cloves", "amount": 4}, {"name": "onion", "units": "piece", "amount": 1}, {"name": "tomato", "units": "pieces", "amount": 2}, {"name": "freshly ground pork", "units": "kilograms", "amount": 0.25}, {"name": "potato", "units": "piece", "amount": 1}, {"name": "small carrot", "units": "piece", "amount": 1}, {"name": "MAGGI® Magic Sarap®", "units": "grams", "amount": 8}, {"name": "fresh medium eggs", "units": "pieces", "amount": 6}]
instructions: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, tomato, pork, potato and carrot in oil. Season with ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. 2. Beat eggs and season with remaining ½ sachet of MAGGI® Magic Sarap®. 3. Pour beaten egg, gently stir and cook until barely set. Cover with plate, flip and return to the pan to cook the other side. Transfer on a serving plate and serve with preferred dipping sauce.
notes: Tortang Giniling best served with Sinangag and simple vegetables dish.
